DOC.brief_summary: Study Design : Clinical measurement ( cross-sectional ) Objectives : The purpose study investigate reliability validity novel scapular dyskinesis classification test . Background : A visual-based clinical assessment sufficient reliability validity identify scapular dyskinesis provide information rehabilitation treatment . Methods : A visual-based palpation method evaluate two independent physiotherapist 60 subject unilateral shoulder pain test reliability . This method classify scapular movement arm raising/lowing movement scapular plane single abnormal scapular pattern ( inferior angle/ medial border/ superior border scapula prominence abnormal scapulohumeral rhythm ) mix abnormal scapular pattern . Different pattern scapular dyskinesis also validate correspond alternation scapular kinematics muscular activity assess electromagnetic motion-capturing system surface electromyography ( EMG ) .
DOC.brief_title: Scapular Dyskinesis : Reliability Validity Study Comprehensive Classification Test
DOC.criteria: ( 1 ) 18 50 year old ( 2 ) unilateral shoulder pain around shoulder complex activity . history shoulder dislocation , fracture , shoulder surgery within past 1 year , history direct contact injury neck upper extremity within past 1 month , scoliosis excessive kyphosis , neurological disorder , body mass index ( BMI ) â‰§25 , demonstrate pain ( VAS > 3 ) overall testing procedure .
